remarks: Inverse of a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsuminv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsuminv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsuminv.p $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
gsuminv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsuminv.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsuminv.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsuminv.n $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsuminv $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
